head.supplied: Dr. Mueller &c. ¶ Sydney 13 June 1857. ¶ Sir, ¶ ¶ I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of the copy of your Report on the Botany of North Australia. ¶ ¶ I am also directed to request you will ...

div.p: MS Q430 outward letter copy book, p. 55, Gregory papers, Dixson Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.
See also M to A. Gregory, 4 June 1857 and M to A. Gregory 13 June 1857 (in this edition as 57-06-13a). Dr. Mueller &c.
I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of the copy of your Report on the Botany of North Australia.
I am also directed to request you will furnish, a duplicate copy of this report to accompany The Governor General's duplicate Dispatch to the Secretary of State.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
A. C. Gregory
Gregory transmitted the duplicate of M's report to the Colonial Secretary's Department, 7 June 1857 (No. 60/57, MS Q430, p. 51). It was acknowledged by the Department on 9 June 1857, with a request for Gregory 'to call upon Dr. Mueller to furnish another copy of his report to accompany the Governor General's Duplicate Despatch to the Secretary of State' (No. 463, MS Q427).
